segments.text: Earning extra income on the Internet is easier than you might think . After I started selling traditional craft items on the Internet last year , I have really been able to make bank doing something I love .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that right ? I hear all these horror stories of internet business crashing because there is not enough of a customer base yet . How can you be sure your idea will cash in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To run a successful internet business , it requires a little research and relatively small investment . You've got to have a good idea of some kind of product that is in demand or would be popular .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's marketing research ... But what about getting started once you have an idea ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After you have your great idea , then you can set up shop by registering a domain name , creating a website , an email address , and a hosting service . If you want to go all out on your website , you can put together shopping cart technology , but that can be pricey to start out with .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like a lot of work !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anything worth doing takes work . Money doesn't grow on trees ... Most of us have to work for it .
segments.speaker: S1
